OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

addComment(uint256,string).details: Adds a comment to a post.

params._postId: The ID of the post to comment on.

getComment(uint256,uint256).details: Returns the details of a comment on a post.

returns.commenter: The address of the user who made the comment.
returns.timestamp: The time when the comment was made.

getPost(uint256).details: Returns the details of a post.

returns.author: The address of the post's author.
returns.commentsCount: The number of comments on the post.
returns.likes: The number of likes the post has received.
returns.timestamp: The time when the post was created.

getPostsCount().details: Returns the total number of posts.

getUserByAddress(address).details: Returns the user details for a given address.

returns._0: The User struct for the given address.

params._postId: The ID of the post to like.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._username: The username chosen by the user.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
